messagingsystem

Class ReplyMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • messagingsystem.ReplyMsg

  • public class ReplyMsg
extends java.lang.Object
    The class below will only get executed only if the user is already existing into the records and the validationForLogin turns out to be true. The accountIndex is used to obtain the index where we have find the user in the array list of all the users. The displayMenuReply method displays the menu for the user to reply to a message, read/write to a message or logout of a system.
